properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "\\isoburn.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\PowerISO.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\ImgBurn.exe") and (InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\Winrar.exe" or InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\7zFM.exe" or InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\peazip.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects cases in which an ISO files is opend within an archiver like 7Zip or Winrar, which is a sign of phishing as threat actors put small ISO files in archives as email attachments to bypass certain filters and protective measures (mark of web)
